Reviews.Title: Perfect condition and great customer service!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I bought this iphone for my girlfriend and it got shipped to me super fast! It was in perfect condition and also came with screen protectors. She's been using the iphone for a couple months now and has had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product, perfect customer service!
Reviews.Author: shilton89
Reviews.Content: I contacted the seller a couple of times and had prompt professional service! We got it fast. The serial # on the box didn't match the # in the phones settings so we had a little issues getting it activated but it all panned out!

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: David Fischer
Reviews.Content: I was initially apprehensive about ordering my iPhone from a third party on vendor online, but it was my only reasonable option so I gave it a go.  I had no problems activating my iPhone onto my Sprint data network and I have not had any problems with it over the past few months.  If I would happen to wreck my phone between upgrades again, I would order from this vendor again.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: SOPERIA TRAYLOR
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT THIS PHONE ITS AMAZING AND ITS AMA ZING AND LOOKS BRAND NEW CAME IN PERFECT BOX WITH CHARGER AND HEAD PHONES I WOULD MOST DEFINATELY RECOMMEND THAT YOU BUY ANYTHING FROM YHIS BUYER!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Got to my house early and it still works fantastic in the month I've had it. If u need a new iPhone 4 get it here.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely terrible!
Reviews.Author: nyafair
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone since last year and I'm sooooooo glad I'm about to get an upgrade. This phone has been giving me trouble since two weeks after I had got it. The phone cuts off at random times such as during phone calls, it freezes and I'll end up having to restart it. I spent $180 on this phone and to this day, that was a complete waste of money. I'll be very happy going to get my new phone and finally getting rid of this crap.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Blanca Akers
Reviews.Content: Great phone.  Came as promised...no straches!  I was a little dissapointed in the shipping.  I didn't get it in time for Christmas but I still surprised my husband.

Reviews.Title: My daughters new favortite toy!
Reviews.Author: Mandy L. Glass
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a starter phone for my daughter. It has become a permenant attachment. Great buy and quick shipping!

Reviews.Title: finally got it and I love it.
Reviews.Author: M. Collins
Reviews.Content: I did receive the wrong phone to begin with (AT&T; as opposed to the Sprint that was advertised) had a little trouble getting the"marketplace" supplier to believe me but as soon as I contacted Amazon directly a new phone was sent (Sprint) overnight andit is wonderful.Being without a phone for a few weeks was inconvenient but I didn't die or anything.  I learned to cope.  I have been dealing withAmazon for over 10 years and they really showed how much they value me as a customer.  Felt good.  lol

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: The phone took a week to get to me, I thought It was a little too long. When I got it, it came in very flimsy packaging but the phone was in great condition. Was able to activate it and I like it a lot!

Reviews.Title: Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: eduardo
Reviews.Content: Good sell, the item its working perfectly there are no problems with it, thank you for a food sell. thank you for everything!

Reviews.Title: I was iffy at first
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: But when I got the phone it was in a retail package and the phone itself seemed brand new, seller said they are all guaranteed clean ESN's and that is exactly what I got. Beautiful phone now I bought a Otter-box today and just ordered a privacy screen protector to completely safe-house this phone. I' m so glad I'm away from droids. I'd recommend any product from this seller to anyone. If you're iffy about it like I was contact the seller first I promise they will reply and will be honest with you.

Reviews.Title: I love my iphone
Reviews.Author: Erin Beinke
Reviews.Content: At first, it was really hard to set up and I thought it was stollen. Which had me worried. But the Lady on Sprint said the iphone setup network was down and will take some time. So a few hours after midnight, I did the ritual and, BOOM it works. I love this phone. Easily the best phone I have ever had.

Reviews.Title: Unable to activate!
Reviews.Author: Mamasan22
Reviews.Content: Seller shipped product quickly and was described as NEW. However, Sprint could not activate the Iphone because it was locked to another account on their network. I wasted hours on the phone with Apple and Sprint customer service as well as driving across town to get this phone to work. I will not order from this seller again!

Reviews.Title: cell information
Reviews.Author: francisco medina
Reviews.Content: Good evening the phone is new? I am interested in purchasing megustaria'm from Venezuela and whether it is new or used fcojavier2178@gmail.com thanks for your answer

Reviews.Title: dudas
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: I wonder if the phone is unlocked and is GSM warranty? I'm interested in, from Venezuela ... I hope your answer thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
Up to 7 hours talk time.
3.5" Retina color display.
5.0-megapixel digital camera with rear-facing camera.
Wi-Fi video calling-capable.
ProductInfo.Name: Apple Iphone 4 8gb Sprint (Black)
